short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unlock your knowledge in new tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"All truly wise thoughts have been thought already thousands of times; but to make them truly ours, we must think them over again honestly, till they take root in our personal experience."
— Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Are you tired of being limited to pre-selected quotes from new tab extensions? Do you have hundreds of quotes saved from countless articles, books, and newsletters? ✍️ Recite is the solution you've been looking for! 

Say goodbye to generic quotes and unlock your personal knowledge base with Recite. This chrome extension replaces each new tab page with a simple and elegant quotation.

Simply input your Google spreadsheet URL and watch as Recite effortlessly displays all your favorite quotes and highlights.

With Recite, you'll only get what you came for - pure, uninterrupted knowledge. No ads, no links, just endless knowledge 🧠 Choose between five different color palettes to personalize your browsing experience 🤍💙💚💜💖

P.S. Recite will never collect or sell your data.
